original_title: Pequeños Gigantes: Contra Viento y Marea
overview: There was a time when Galatasaray was a small football time. However, in 1911 he faced his classic rival, Fenerbahçe, in a historic match, playing as a visitor, with the weather decimated and under a heavy storm. And he was victorious against all odds.
title: Pequeños Gigantes: Contra Viento y Marea
